title: PANIC: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
### Description

One of the repositories stopped opening. It is not known when exactly this happened. The last commit was on June 26, 2025. When trying to access the repository, an error occurred:

PANIC: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference

The rest of the repositories work correctly, only one is unavailable.

Found a similar problem https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/issues/26331
The solution indicates that it has been fixed.

### Gitea Version

1.24.3 built with GNU Make 4.3, go1.24.4: bindata, sqlite, sqlite_unlock_notify, pam, cert

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

No

### Log Gist

_No response_

### Screenshots

_No response_

### Git Version

2.25.1

### Operating System

Ubuntu 20.04

### How are you running Gitea?

Snap

### Database

PostgreSQL
